channel.title: How Do I Use VPS or Dedicated Server Hosting For My Server?
channel.description:
How do I connect the dedicated server/Virtual Private Server to my server?? I need a full explaination please.
Thank you for your time, Play For Keeps

item.title: How Do I Use VPS or Dedicated Server Hosting For My Server?
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

mmk…A little violent…but mmk.
But I meant how do I get the dedicated server to target my private server???

Read full topic
